Name: vm_custom_icons
Overview: Downloads and installs additional custom VM icons to the Unraid VM Manager.

windows icons.Name: windows icons
windows icons.Description: select yes or no to download windows vm icons

linux icons.Name: linux icons
linux icons.Description: select yes or no to download linux vm icons

freebsd icons.Name: freebsd icons
freebsd icons.Description: select yes or no to download freebsd vm icons

macos vm icons.Name: macos vm icons
macos vm icons.Description: select yes or no to download macos vm icons

other os icons.Name: other os  icons
other os icons.Description: select yes or no to download other vm icons

Keep Stock VM Icons.Name: Keep Stock VM Icons
Keep Stock VM Icons.Description: set to no to remove stock unraid vm icons

Clear all icons &amp; redownload above o.Name: Clear all icons & redownload above on each start
Clear all icons &amp; redownload above o.Description: set to yes to delete all vm icons. and redownload the above from github on every run of container

Enable sucess tune on icon load.Name: Enable sucess tune on icon load
Enable sucess tune on icon load.Description: Enable tune on sucess. (you must have a beep speaker)

Time to wait before exit.Name: Time to wait before exit
Time to wait before exit.Description: Time to wait before stopping container after syncing icons

vm manager icon location.Name: vm manager icon location
vm manager icon location.Description: location on server where Unraid stores vm icons (dont change this)
